page.title: 09SPORTS FACILITIES
page.content:
AND DONCASTER. SPORTS CENTRES AND SWIMMING POOLS ARE ALSO SITUATED IN THE LARGER TOWNS. THE NEAREST GOLF COURSE IS SITUATED IN RETFORD ALTHOUGH THIS IS FOR MEMBERS ONLY. A MUNICIPALCOURSE IS SITUATED IN WORKSOP SOME TEN MILES FROM THE WESTERN EDGE OF THE GRID.TENNIS COURTS AND BOWLS GREENS ARE SITUATED IN NORTH WHEATLEY AS IS A CRICKET CLUB AND FOOTBALL TEAMS. HAYTON TOO HAS THESE FACILITIES.
WHAT MUST BE STRESSED IS THAT THE RESIDENTS OF THE GRID DO NOT HAVE THE IMMEDIATE ACCESS TO FACILITIES WHICH URBAN DWELLERS WOULD TAKE FOR GRANTED ALTHOUGH THERE ARE OTHER COMPENSATIONS.
